verses.verse: <S%G3326><s%> But After <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ceased <S%G3973><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tumult, <S%G2351><s%> Having <S%G4341><s%> Called To Him <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples, <S%G3101><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saluted Them <S%G782><s%> Went Away <S%G1831><s%> To Go <S%G4198><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Macedonia. <S%G3109><s%>

<S%G1330><s%> And Having Passed Through <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Those <S%G3313><s%> Parts, <S%G1565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Exhorted <S%G3870><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> With Discourse <S%G3056><s%> Much, <S%G4183><s%> He Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Greece. <S%G1671><s%>

<S%G4160><s%> And Having Continued <S%G5037><s%> Months <S%G3376><s%> Three, <S%G5140><s%> Having Been Made <S%G1096><s%> Against Them <S%G846><s%> A Plot <S%G1917><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> Being About <S%G3195><s%> To Sail <S%G321><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Syria, <S%G4947><s%> Arose <S%G1096><s%> A Purpose <S%G1106><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Return <S%G5290><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Macedonia. <S%G3109><s%>

<S%G4902><s%> And Accompanied <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> As Far As <S%G891><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%> Sopater <S%G4986><s%> A Berean, <S%G961><s%> <S%G2331><s%> And Of Thessalonians <S%G1161><s%> Aristarchus <S%G708><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Secundus, <S%G4580><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gaius <S%G1050><s%> Of Derbe <S%G1190><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> <S%G774><s%> And Of Asia <S%G1161><s%> Tychicus <S%G5190><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Trophimus. <S%G5161><s%>
Those <S%G3778><s%> Having Gone Before <S%G4281><s%> Waited For <S%G3306><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Troas; <S%G5174><s%>

<S%G2249><s%> But We <S%G1161><s%> Sailed Away <S%G1602><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Unleavened Bread <S%G106><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Philippi, <S%G5375><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> At <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Troas <S%G5174><s%> In <S%G891><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Five, <S%G4002><s%> Where <S%G3757><s%> We Stayed <S%G1304><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Seven. <S%G2033><s%>

And <S%G1722><s%> On <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Week, <S%G4521><s%> Having Been Assembled <S%G4863><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Break <S%G2806><s%> Bread, <S%G740><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> Discoursed <S%G1256><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> About <S%G3195><s%> To Depart <S%G1826><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Morrow; <S%G1887><s%> <S%G3905><s%> And He Continued <S%G5037><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Discourse <S%G3056><s%> Till <S%G3360><s%> Midnight. <S%G3317><s%>

And <S%G2258><s%> Were <S%G1161><s%> Lamps <S%G2985><s%> Many <S%G2425><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Upper Room <S%G5253><s%> Where <S%G3757><s%> They Were <S%G2258><s%> Assembled. <S%G4863><s%>

<S%G2521><s%> And Was Sitting <S%G1161><s%> A Certain <S%G5100><s%> Youth, <S%G3494><s%> By Name <S%G3686><s%> Eutychus, <S%G2161><s%> By <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Window, <S%G2376><s%> Overpowered <S%G2702><s%> By Sleep <S%G5258><s%> Deep, <S%G901><s%> As Discoursed <S%G1256><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> For <S%G1909><s%> A Longer Time, <S%G4119><s%> Having Been Overpowered <S%G2702><s%> By <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sleep <S%G5258><s%> He Fell <S%G4098><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third Story <S%G5152><s%> Down, <S%G2736><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Taken Up <S%G142><s%> Dead. <S%G3498><s%>

<S%G2597><s%> But Having Descended <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> Fell Upon <S%G1968><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Embraced Him <S%G4843><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Do <S%G3361><s%> Not Make A Tumult, <S%G2350><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Life <S%G5590><s%> Of Him <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

<S%G305><s%> And Having Gone Up <S%G1161><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Broken <S%G2806><s%> Bread <S%G740><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Eaten, <S%G1089><s%> ' And <S%G1909><s%> <S%G2425><s%> For Long <S%G5037><s%> Having Conversed <S%G3656><s%> Until <S%G891><s%> Daybreak, <S%G827><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> He Departed. <S%G1831><s%>
<S%G71><s%> And They Brought <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Boy <S%G3816><s%> Alive, <S%G2198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Comforted <S%G3870><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> A Little. <S%G3357><s%>

But <S%G2249><s%> We <S%G1161><s%> Having Gone Before <S%G4281><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> Sailed <S%G321><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Assos, <S%G789><s%> There <S%G1564><s%> Being About <S%G3195><s%> To Take In <S%G353><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul; <S%G3972><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> He <S%G2258><s%> Had Appointed, <S%G1299><s%> Being About <S%G3195><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> To Go On Foot. <S%G3978><s%>

And <S%G5613><s%> When <S%G1161><s%> He Met With <S%G4820><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> At <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Assos, <S%G789><s%> Having Taken In <S%G353><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> We Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Mitylene; <S%G3412><s%>

And Thence <S%G2547><s%> Having Sailed Away, <S%G636><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Following Day <S%G1966><s%> Arrived <S%G2658><s%> Opposite <S%G481><s%> Chios, <S%G5508><s%> And <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> Next Day <S%G2087><s%> We Arrived <S%G3846><s%> At <S%G1519><s%> Samos; <S%G4544><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Remained <S%G3306><s%> At <S%G1722><s%>, Trogyllium, <S%G5175><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Next Day <S%G2192><s%> We Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Miletus : <S%G3399><s%>

Had Decided <S%G2919><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> To Sail By <S%G3896><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ephesus, <S%G2181><s%> So That <S%G3704><s%> It <S%G3361><s%> Might Not Happen <S%G1096><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> To Spend Time <S%G5551><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Asia; <S%G773><s%> He Hastened <S%G4692><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Possible <S%G1415><s%> It Was <S%G2258><s%> For Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Pentecost <S%G4005><s%> To Be <S%G1096><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%>

And <S%G575><s%> From <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Miletus <S%G3399><s%> Having Sent <S%G3992><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Ephesus <S%G2181><s%> He Called For <S%G3333><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly. <S%G1577><s%>

And <S%G5613><s%> When <S%G1161><s%> They Were Come <S%G3854><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Know, <S%G1987><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The First <S%G4413><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> ' On <S%G575><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I Arrived <S%G1910><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Asia, <S%G773><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> All The <S%G3956><s%> Time <S%G5550><s%> I Was, <S%G1096><s%>

Serving <S%G1398><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Humility <S%G5012><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Tears <S%G1144><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Temptations, <S%G3986><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Happened <S%G4819><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> Through <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Plots <S%G1917><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews; <S%G2453><s%>

How <S%G5613><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> I Kept Back <S%G5288><s%> Of What <S%G3588><s%> Is Profitable <S%G4851><s%> So As <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Announce It <S%G312><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Teach <S%G1321><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Publicly <S%G1219><s%> <S%G1219><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> ' From <S%G2596><s%> House To House, <S%G3624><s%>

Earnestly Testifying <S%G1263><s%> <S%G2453><s%> Both To Jews <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Greeks <S%G1672><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Toward <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Repentance <S%G3341><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Toward <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Now, <S%G3568><s%>, Lo, <S%G2400><s%> I, <S%G1473><s%> Bound <S%G1210><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> Go <S%G4198><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> The Things Which <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Shall Happen <S%G4876><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Knowing; <S%G1492><s%>

Except <S%G4133><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> In Every <S%G2596><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Fully Testifies, <S%G1263><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Bonds <S%G1199><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Tribulations <S%G2347><s%> Await. <S%G3306><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> Of Nothing <S%G3762><s%> Account <S%G3056><s%> I Make, <S%G4160><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Hold I 2192 V-PAI-1S 3588 T-ASF Life 5590 N-ASF My 3450 P-1GS Dear 5093 A-ASF To Myself, 1683 F-1DSM So As 5613 ADV To Finish 5048 V-AAN 3588 T-ASM Course 1408 N-ASM My 3450 P-1GS With 3326 PREP, Joy, 5479 N-GSF And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-ASF Ministry 1248 N-ASF Which 3739 R-ASF I Received 2983 V-2AAI-1S From 3844 PREP The 3588 T-GSM Lord 2962 N-GSM Jesus, 2424 N-GSM To Testify Fully 1263 V-ADN The 3588 T-ASN Glad Tidings 2098 N-ASN Of The 3588 T-GSF Grace 5485 N-GSF 3588 T-GSM Of God. 2316 N-GSM

And <S%G2532><s%> Now, <S%G3568><s%>, Lo, <S%G2400><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Know 1492 V-RAI-1S That 3754 CONJ No More 3765 ADV Will See 3700 V-FDI-2P 3588 T-ASN 4383 N-ASN My Face 3450 P-1GS Ye 5210 P-2NP All, 3956 A-NPM Among 1722 PREP Whom 3739 R-DPM I Have Gone About 1330 V-2AAI-1S Proclaiming 2784 V-PAP-NSM The 3588 T-ASF Kingdom 932 N-ASF 3588 T-GSM Of God. 2316 N-GSM

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> I Testify <S%G3143><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> This <S%G4594><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Pure <S%G2513><s%> I Am <S%G1473><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> Of All, <S%G3956><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5288><s%> <S%G3588><s%> I Kept Back <S%G3361><s%> From Announcing <S%G312><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Counsel <S%G1012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Take Heed <S%G4337><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> To Yourselves <S%G1438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Flock, <S%G4168><s%> Where <S%G1722><s%> In <S%G3739><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Did Set <S%G5087><s%> Overseers, <S%G1985><s%> To Shepherd <S%G4165><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Purchased <S%G4046><s%> With <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of His Own <S%G2398><s%> Blood. <S%G129><s%>

I 1473 P-1NS, For 1063 CONJ Know 1492 V-RAI-1S, This, 5124 D-ASN That 3754 CONJ Will Come In 1525 V-FDI-3P After 3326 PREP My 3588 T-ASF 867 N-ASF Departure 3450 P-1GS Wolves 3074 N-NPM Grievous 926 A-NPM Amongst 1519 PREP You, 5209 P-2AP Not 3361 PRT-N Sparing 5339 V-PNP-NPM The 3588 T-GSN Flock; 4168 N-GSN

And <S%G2532><s%> From Amongst <S%G1537><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> Own Selves <S%G846><s%> Will Rise Up <S%G450><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Speaking <S%G2980><s%> Perverted Things, <S%G1294><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Draw Away <S%G645><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> After <S%G3694><s%> Themselves. <S%G846><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Watch, <S%G1127><s%> Remembering <S%G3421><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Three <S%G5148><s%> Years <S%G3571><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Ceased Not <S%G3973><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Tears <S%G1144><s%> Admonishing <S%G3560><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Each. <S%G1538><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> I Commit <S%G3908><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%>, Brethren, <S%G80><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Grace, <S%G5485><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%>, To Build Up <S%G2026><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Give <S%G1325><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> An Inheritance <S%G2817><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sanctified <S%G37><s%> All. <S%G3956><s%>
Silver <S%G694><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Gold <S%G5553><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Clothing <S%G2441><s%> Of No One <S%G3762><s%> I Desired. <S%G1937><s%>

<S%G846><s%> But Yourselves <S%G1161><s%> Know <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5532><s%> To My Needs <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Were <S%G5607><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> Did Minister <S%G5256><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands. <S%G5495><s%> Those <S%G3778><s%>

All Things <S%G3956><s%> I Showed <S%G5263><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Labouring <S%G2872><s%> It Behooves Us <S%G1163><s%> To Aid <S%G482><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Being Weak, <S%G770><s%> <S%G3421><s%> And To Remember <S%G5037><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Words <S%G3056><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> To Give <S%G1325><s%> More <S%G3123><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> To Receive. <S%G2983><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Having Said <S%G2036><s%> Having Bowed <S%G5087><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Knees <S%G1119><s%> His <S%G846><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> He Prayed. <S%G4336><s%>

<S%G2425><s%> And Much <S%G1161><s%> There Was <S%G1096><s%> Weeping <S%G2805><s%> Of All : <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Falling <S%G1968><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Neck <S%G5137><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Paul <S%G3972><s%> They Ardently Kissed <S%G2705><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>

Distressed <S%G3600><s%> Most Of All <S%G3122><s%> For <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Had Said, <S%G2046><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> No More <S%G3765><s%> They Are About <S%G3195><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%> His <S%G846><s%> To See. <S%G2334><s%> <S%G4311><s%> And They Accompanied <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship. <S%G4143><s%>
